title: Indha Ponnugale Lyrics Varuthapadatha Vaalibar Sangam Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Indha PonnugaleÂ 
Singer(s): Jayamoorthy
Movie: Varuthapadatha Vaalibar Sangam
Music: D Imman
Lyrics: Yugabharathy		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Indha Ponnugale
ippadithaan purinjupochuda
Avanga kannu namma
colour-nu therinju pochuda

Pinnaala suthavachi
pithukuli aaga vachi
Illaadha kanaka ellaam poduvaangada
avanga paarvayaala
paaldaayila oothuvaangada

Indha Ponnugale
ippadithaan purinjupochuda
Avanga kannu namma
colour-nu therinju pochuda

Kaathu vaangi kodukurom
kavidhai ezhudhi kodukurom
cell-u vaangi kodukurom
recharge-um panni kodukurom

Anba kooda vaari vaari kodukurom
avanga veetukundhaan ration
vaangi kodukurom

naama koduthadhellaam vaangitta avangathaan
vedhanaya kodukuraanga ennada
idhula needhi nerma irukudhaanu solluda

Indha Ponnugale
ippadithaan purinjupochuda
Avanga kannu namma
colour-nu therinju pochuda

Veedu vaasal marakurom
vetkam rosam marakurom
nalla thoonga marakurom
nanbanayum marakurom

naalu kilama kooda naama marakurom
avanga nenapulathaan
yellaathayum marakurom

Naama marapethellaam
thrinjikita avangathaan
avanga pora pokkil
marakuraanga ennada ?
en sogam maraka udikurenu
solluda ...

Indha Ponnugale ...
Pinnaala suthavachi ...English Translation
I tried my best :)
